project_descr: The objective of the project is to protect and empower the people who have been most severely affected by climate-change induced drought in 13 communities in three of the most vulnerable agro-ecological zones of Lesotho.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to protect and empower the people who have been most severely affected by climate-change induced drought in 13 communities in three of the most vulnerable agro-ecological zones of Lesotho. The project will mainly focus on 483,500 people in those 13 selected communities in the southern lowlands, Senqu River Valley and mountain agro-ecological zones.

document_name: UNTFHS Signed Financial Agreement for UNDP.pdf
